mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS usage_count , SUM(use_time) AS usage_minute , ROUND(SUM(use_distance)*1.0, 1) AS usage_meter , round(SUM(use_distance)/1000*0.232, 1) AS carbon_reduction FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt}

SELECT svc_use.use_no, user_no, IFNULL(c_pay.SVC_USE_PAY_NO,p_pay.SVC_USE_PAY_NO) AS svc_use_pay_no, use_distance, use_time, use_start_dt, use_end_dt, IFNULL(c_pay.pay_datetime, p_pay.PAY_DATETIME) AS pay_datetime, IFNULL(IF(c_pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE,'C', c_pay.PAY_COST),0) AS card_pay, IFNULL(IF(p_pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE,'P', p_pay.PAY_COST),0) AS point_pay FROM kickboard_svc.t_svc_use svc_use LEFT JOIN kickboard_svc.t_svc_use_pay AS c_pay ON svc_use.USE_NO = c_pay.use_no AND c_pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'C' LEFT JOIN kickboard_svc.t_svc_use_pay AS p_pay ON svc_use.USE_NO = p_pay.use_no AND p_pay.PAYMETHOD_CODE = 'P' WHERE 1=1 AND user_no=#{user_no} AND DATE(use_start_dt)>=#{start_dt} LIMIT #{page_size} OFFSET #{offset}
